trans-unit.source: Defines an individual endpoint contained in the XML Web service.

This class specifies a single address (URI) for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding>, which defines message format and protocol details for operations and messages for a given <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Port.Binding%2A> property gets or sets those values for a specified `Port`.
This class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<port>` element, which is enclosed by the `<service>` element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the value of the XML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<binding>" name="<binding>" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref>.
A binding defines message format and protocol details for operations and messages for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortType>.
This property gets or sets those values for a specific `Port`.
The value of the XML binding.
Gets the collection of extensibility elements associated with the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref>.
The collection of extensibility elements associated with the port.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"></xref> of which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref> is a member.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"></xref> of which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Port"></xref> is a member.
